resource: 1003225.vtc=true 1003225.1002622.description=Front passenger's seatbelt buzzer:The front passenger's seatbelt buzzer sounds to alert the front passenger that his or her seatbelt is not fastened. The buzzer sounds intermittently for 10 seconds after the vehicle has reached a speed of at least 12 mph (20km/h). Then, if the seatbelt is still unfastened, the buzzer will sound in a different tone for 20 more seconds. 1003225.description=Front passenger's seatbelt buzzer:The front passenger's seatbelt buzzer sounds to alert the front passenger that his or her seatbelt is not fastened. The buzzer sounds intermittently for 10 seconds after the vehicle has reached a speed of at least 12 mph (20km/h). Then, if the seatbelt is still unfastened, the buzzer will sound in a different tone for 20 more seconds. 1003225.source=MANUAL_IMPORT
